title: Priti Patel says police must take harassment more seriously
content:
1. Priti Patel says police must take harassment more seriously  BBC News
  2. London Police, Under Fire on Everard Murder, Respond With Safety Tips  Yahoo News
  3. Met Police under fire for advising women stopped by lone officer to 'wave down a bus'  Channel 4 News
  4. Boris Johnson: Violence against women not being taken seriously by police  Evening Standard
  5. After Sarah Everard’s murder, police powers need to be curbed not strengthened  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
